name: toque
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also toque blanche, uk/ˌtəʊk ˈblɑ̃ːʃ/ us/ˌtoʊk ˈblɑːnʃ/) a tall white hat with folds in the top part, worn by chefs (= professional cooks)
studiocasper/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
CANADIAN ENGLISH a hat made of wool that fits closely to the head, often with a small, round wool ball on top
hatman12/iStock/Getty Image Plus/GettyImages
a small women's hat
